Key.English: Intelligence reports that the Viet Cong and NVA are using three underground bunkers as command and control facilities in the Tri-Border area. MACV-SOG along with US Army "Tunnel Rats" have been tasked with going "across the fence" to clear the bunkers and collect intellgence.
Viet Cong and NVA are using three underground bunkers as command and control facilities in the Tri-Border area. Locate, clear the bunkers and collect intellgence.
ALiVE Mod Team || Mission by Tupolov

ALiVE populates the entire map with a full scale war. The AI commanders determine the strategy and use conventional or asymmetric warfare tactics to achieve their goals. Infantry, motorized, mechanized, armored units and aircraft are used to capture or defend strategic objectives across the area of operations.

AI commanders will call in resupply and reinforcements, close air support and air strikes and recruit insurgencts from the civilian population to plant IEDs and conduct sabotage. Meanwhile, the civilian population actively support or turn against combatants based on their actions and interactions.

As a squad playing an ALiVE mission, you must work together to use the tools at your disposal to patrol, identify and attack enemy units, positions and assets. Player Commanders using the ALiVE Menu can manage operations and tasks in coordination with AI commanders.

The ALiVE Menu can be activated using the RIGHT APP MENU key (or a user defined key 20).

For ADMINS, the ALiVE Menu offers the chance to debug issues, teleport players, access the debug console and more.

For PLAYERS, the ALiVE Menu offers some basic settings and a chance to save your position and loadout.

Using the scroll wheel,PLAYERS can interact with civilians to question them on the local situation and influence them by giving them rations. Civilians won't forgive collateral damage.

Using the map, PLAYERS can leave SPOTREPS and ADVANCED MARKERS by hitting the LEFT CTRL key when creating a map marker.

For PLAYER COMMANDERS with an appropriate radio (PRC-77) the ALiVE Menu enables you to access COMMANDER ACTIONS to manage personnel, logistics, tasks, combat support and more.

ALiVE COMMANDER ACTIONS (requires PRC-77)

Press the ALiVE Menu key to access Commander Actions.

Personnel - Move players and AI units between groups

Intel - Provides access to your side's AI Commander objectives as well as marking any known units on the map.

Logistics - Call in resupplies, from individuals and groups to vehicles, weapons and fortifications. Use convoys, airdrop or airlift.

Tasks - Request tasks from the AI commander in order to contribute to the overall battlefield situation.

Operations - Direct AI groups and issue waypoints or join AI controlled groups and fight alongside them.

Combat Support - Request artillery, close air support or transport from assets within the AO.

Reports - Commanders can leave PATROLREPS and SITREPS in order to keep other commanders up to date with player and enemy activities.

Intelligence reports that the Viet Cong and NVA are using three underground bunkers as command and control facilities in the Tri-Border area.

MACV-SOG along with US Army "Tunnel Rats" have been tasked with going "across the fence" to clear the bunkers and collect intellgence.

The area west is heavily populated with Viet Cong and civilians are likely to be opposed to US forces.

To the east, the NVA control the area all the way down to the southern DMZ.

Recon Team Idaho will insert via helo to Outpost Meyer along the Vietnam/Laos border. From there the team will patrol west, searching for underground bunkers here, here and here.

Tunnels are likely to be within 30m of the objective (based on our intel). An example tunnel entrance can be seen here:
<

Once the bunkers have been cleared, RT Idaho must escape and evade to RV Bowra before calling in air assets for extraction.

Combat Support and Combat Service Support assets are available including Support Helicopters, Artillery, Mortars and a Cobra Attack Helicopter on call for Close Air Support.

There are a limited number of PRC-77 radios available for the RTO to request and coord support from HQ. Don't lose them!

The Duty Officer at Outpost Meyet can despatch you directly to your squad (if its enabled in mission settings).

Avoid calling in helicopter air extraction while behind enemy lines. Look for enemy boats or other vehicle to escape and evade back to RV Bowra

Patrol west to the first objective, clear the village and find the bunker entrance. Clear the enemy bunker and collect intelligence dropped by enemy soldiers.

Patrol to the second and third objectives with the same execution.

Resupplies, close air support and artillery can be requested via PRC-77 only in emergencies.

Once the three objectives have been cleared, escape and evade to RV Bowra using whatever enemy/civilian vehicles are available.

Once at RV Bowra, call in heli extraction and return to Pleiku Airbase.
